title: Student-Centered Assessment Tool Design to Strengthen Maker Education Evaluation Capabilities at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Basic maker education concepts and middle school education experience
context.additional_context: Program aimed at enhancing maker project evaluation competencies in smartphone-based learning environments, focusing on the applicability of assessment tools within limited technological settings

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core characteristics (e.g., creativity, process reflectivity, practicality) for evaluating the evidence quality of student-generated outputs in maker projects.
Learners can design a feedback framework to analyze maker learning outcomes using student-centered assessment tools.
Learners can develop a checklist to evaluate smartphone-based project outputs in limited technological environments.

resources: Maker Education Assessment Guide within LMS
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
